actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to increase the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of Federal employees' health benefits insurance, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the present contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of Federal employees' health benefits insurance from 40 percent to 50 percent. Provides that such increase shall commence with the pay period after December 31, 1973. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8906(a))

titles.title: A bill to increase the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of Federal employees' health benefits insurance, and for other purposes.
